name: MarketInsight
description: View and share stocks in realtime

scripts.start:dev: cross-env DEBUG=http,wss,stock,watch NODE_ENV=development && node index.js | pino-colada
scripts.build-all:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npm-run-all clean build-js:dev build-css:dev
scripts.build-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npm-run-all clean build-js build-css
scripts.build-css:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npx node-sass --source-map-embed --error-bell resources/assets/styles/app.sass | npx hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.css' --silent
scripts.build-css: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npx node-sass --sourcemap=none resources/assets/styles/app.sass | npx cleancss --inline local | npx hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.min.css' --silent
scripts.build-js:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npx browserify resources/assets/scripts/index.js -t sheetify -g unassertify | npx hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.js' --silent
scripts.build-js: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npx browserify --full-paths -t sheetify -g [ loose-envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g unassertify -g babelify -g uglifyify resources/assets/scripts/index.js | npx hashmark -l 8 'public/app-{hash}.min.js' --silent

author: idealwebsolutions
